name: European Energy Forum
goal:
The EEF events provide a place for discussion where EU actors in the energy sector can meet, get informed and debate and where all points of views and ideas are welcome.
The EEF promotes the dialogue and the debate between different parties : MEPs, industry, civil servants, scientific community, … involved in energy issues through a variety of events (dinner-debates, lunchtime discussions, visits, …) The EEF combines the proposals from its Associate Members with the interest of the Active Members (MEPs) in co-operation with the European Commission.
The events are chaired by the President of the EEF who is an MEP.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: Our association monitors dossiers related to energy issues.  All fields relating to energy are of interest to our neutral forum.  Our association also monitors environment and climate dossiers.
